name: cherubically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that reminds people of a cherub (= an angel in art like a child with a round, attractive face): He pulled himself together and beamed at them cherubically. I turned up at his door and was greeted by a very small, cherubically smiling man.
More examplesFewer examplesWe were met by a cherubically sparkly-eyed man in his mid-thirties whose passion for shoes exceeded even our own.He was cherubically good-looking, funny, charming, polite, well spoken, and considerate.
